pets.title: Golden Retriever
pets.subtitle: Man's Bestfriend
pets.review: This is one of the finest family dogs in the world.

pets.title: Siamese
pets.subtitle: Partner in Crime
pets.review: These beautiful cats are very intelligent and need a great deal of stimulation and interaction.

pets.title: Amazon Parrots
pets.subtitle: Renowned Talkers
pets.review: Amazon parrots are good family pets that enjoy interacting with their human "flock".

pets.title: Syrian Hamster
pets.subtitle: Friendly Companion
pets.review: Syrian hamsters are generally low-maintenance, quiet, and interesting pets.

pets.title: Holland Lop
pets.subtitle: Siamese Fighting Fish
pets.review: Unlike some fish species, they are highly interactive and you can truly "bond" with them.
